title: N.H. middle schoolers used AI to create nudes of classmates, parents say
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News “Manipulated, AI-generated sexual or abusive content cannot be viewed as a prank.

” By Abby Patkin November 19, 2025 | 4:08 PM 2 minutes to read A New Hampshire middle school is in the spotlight after students allegedly used artificial intelligence to generate nude images of three female classmates, according to local news reports.
“It’s been very disturbing, it’s really been devastating, and it’s been infuriating,” one of the girls’ mothers told Boston 25 News.

title: Federal prosecutor who probed Karen Read case jumps into Norfolk DA race
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Politics Adam Deitch touted his experience “putting a microscope to entrenched institutions” and pledged accountability and integrity.
Adam Deitch, a former federal prosecutor who oversaw an investigation into the state's handling of the Karen Read case, is getting into the race for Norfolk County DA.

title: 2 adults and 4 children were traveling on the Maine Turnpike when their trailer had an issue. An ensuing crash killed both adults.
author: John Waller
bullets: Local News "All four children were transported to Maine Medical Center," Maine State Police said.

By John Waller November 19, 2025 | 2:32 PM 1 minute to read Two adults and four children — ages 7 to 14 — were traveling south in an SUV on the Maine Turnpike early Wednesday morning when their U-Haul trailer started to become detached and they pulled off on the right shoulder in New Gloucester, according to Maine State Police.
The trailer, now connected to their 2017 GMC Acadia only by the safety chains, was still partially in the roadway shortly before 4:30 a.
